welcome.message:
Hello, {member}, welcome to JHodgson1's personal Discord server. Please ensure to read the rules in <#544999746297790474> and abide by them. If you have any issues or concerns feel free to ask in <#544999903848300559> or any scripting channel depending on your question.

We hope you enjoy your stay!
